Class Dalek

java.lang.Object
  Dalek

public class Dalek
extends Object

This class models a Delek in the game. A Delek has a position and can advance towards the Doctor.

Author:
Daniel Burstyn - 20206120

Constructor Detail

Dalek

public Dalek(int theRow,
             int theCol)
Initializes the variables for a Dalek.

Parameters:
theRow - The row this Dalek starts at.
theCol - The column this Dalek starts at.
Method Detail

advanceTowards

public void advanceTowards(Doctor doc)
Attempts to move the Dalek towards the Doctor by the most direct route, moving up, down, right, left or diagonally. For example, if the Doctor is above and to the right of a Dalek, it will move diagonally. If the Doctor is directly below a Dalek, it will move down.

Parameters:
doc - The Doctor to move towards.

getRow

public int getRow()
Returns the row of this Dalek.

Returns:
This Dalek's row.

getCol

public int getCol()
Returns the column of this Dalek.

Returns:
This Dalek's column.

crash

public void crash()
Sets the Dalek to be in a crashed state.

hasCrashed

public boolean hasCrashed()
Returns whether or not this Dalek has crashed.

Returns:
true if this Dalek has crashed, false otherwise
